statements: SELECT * FROM participants
SELECT participant_name, participant_age FROM participants
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE participant_age > 30
SELECT participant_name FROM participants WHERE race_category = 'Marathon'
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM participants ORDER BY participant_name DESC
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT participant_name, race_category FROM participants WHERE participant_age > 30;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM participants WHERE race_category = 'Marathon' ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE participant_age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY participant_age ASC;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, race_category FROM participants WHERE participant_age > 18 AND race_category IN ('5K', '10K') ORDER BY participant_name ASC, participant_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM participant WHERE age > 25
SELECT participant_id, name FROM participant WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT category_name, distance FROM race_category
SELECT * FROM race_category WHERE difficulty = 'Hard'
SELECT name, age, gender FROM participant WHERE name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT * FROM participant WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT participant_id, name, gender FROM participant ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT category_name, distance FROM race_category WHERE difficulty = 'Advanced' ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT participant.name, race_category.category_name FROM participant JOIN race_category ON participant.age < 35;
SELECT participant_id, name, age, gender FROM participant WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM participants;
SELECT race_name, race_date FROM races;
SELECT category_name, distance, difficulty FROM race_categories;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, race_name FROM participants p JOIN races r ON p.participant_id = r.race_id;
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE age > 25 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM participants ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT race_name, race_date FROM races WHERE race_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY race_date DESC;
SELECT participant_id, first_name, last_name, category_name, distance FROM participants JOIN race_categories ON participants.race_category_id = race_categories.race_category_id;
SELECT race_name, category_name, distance FROM races JOIN race_categories ON races.race_category_id = race_categories.race_category_id WHERE difficulty = 'Hard';
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT race_name, race_date, location FROM races;
SELECT participant_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM participants WHERE participant_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM race_categories WHERE max_participants > 50;
SELECT race_name, race_date, COUNT(*) AS total_participants FROM races JOIN registrations ON races.race_id = registrations.race_id GROUP BY race_name, race_date;
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT race_name, race_date, location FROM races WHERE race_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT participant_id, first_name, last_name FROM participants WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT category_name, max_participants FROM race_categories WHERE max_participants >= 50 ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT registration_id, participant_id, race_id FROM registrations ORDER BY registration_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT participant_name, participant_age FROM participants WHERE participant_age > 30;
SELECT race_name, race_location, race_date FROM races ORDER BY race_date DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM race_categories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT participant_name, finish_time FROM participants p JOIN results r ON p.participant_id = r.participant_id WHERE r.finish_time < '00:30:00';
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE participant_age > 30 ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT race_name, race_location, race_date FROM races WHERE race_distance >= 10 ORDER BY race_date ASC;

SELECT participant_name, participant_age, race_name, race_location FROM participants JOIN registrations ON participants.participant_id = registrations.participant_id JOIN races ON registrations.race_id = races.race_id;
SELECT race_name, COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants FROM races JOIN registrations ON races.race_id = registrations.race_id GROUP BY race_name;
SELECT participant_name, result_comment FROM participants JOIN results ON participants.participant_id = results.participant_id WHERE finish_time < '00:30:00';
